author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Tested's head of production Joey shares his favorite camera accessories, books, tabletop games, and gear he used this year!

Hedeco Lime 2 Light Meter: https://hedeco.myshopify.com/products/lime-two-silver-rev1
Tilta Mini Articulating Arm: https://amzn.to/3YmgyWq
Tilta Electronic Suction Cup (4.5″): https://amzn.to/497ut92
Kondor Blue Cinejaws: https://amzn.to/4pACOIk
Smallrig V-Mount Battery 99Wh: https://amzn.to/3XSD8pD
Smallrig Tribex tripod: https://amzn.to/495E0NP
Bebop camera saddle: https://bebopbags.com/products/bebop-regular-size-camera-saddle
Blkbird Mantis: https://blkbrd.film/
Roger Deakins: Byways: https://amzn.to/4oOi7Hy
Reflections: On Cinematography: https://amzn.to/3MyJXdt
Monsters, Aliens, and Holes in the Ground: https://amzn.to/3KHqEhG
Delta Green: The Role-Playing Game: https://amzn.to/4rOdDDH
Disclaimer: Tested may earn an affiliate commission when you buy through the links here.
Find more of Joey's work in our Tested Team channel: https://www.youtube.com/@Tested
title: Tested in 2025: Joey's Favorite Things!
